projects.title: The Digital Builders 757!
projects.description: As the founder of The Digital Builders 757, I spearhead an ambitious initiative aimed at democratizing technology education and fostering a vibrant coding community in the Hampton Roads area. Originating from my personal journey of self-taught coding that led me from truck driving to a successful career in software engineering, The Digital Builders 757 is a testament to the transformative power of technology.

projects.title: Pallet Management System
projects.description: A modern, intuitive web-based application for efficient management of pallet spaces in warehouses or logistics centers. Utilizes Firebase Realtime Database for dynamic, real-time data handling.
